pages.text: Hostile mobs won't spawn at night in the overworld under the stars. $(br2)Phantoms can still spawn, so be sure to get some rest. A sleeping bag is perfect for that on-the-go adventurer!
Be aware of the Blood Moon! During a Blood Moon, hostile mobs will spawn in large numbers. $(br2)To make matters worse, you cannot sleep through a Blood Moon. Be prepared and stay vigilant!
